39 #ifndef HOGFEATURES_HPP_
40 #define HOGFEATURES_HPP_
41 #include <vector>

47 
51 template<typename T>
52 class HOGFeatures : public IFeatures {
53 private:
55  size_t binsize_;
57  size_t nscales_;
59  size_t flen_;
61  size_t norient_;
63  vectorf scales_;
65  float sfactor_;
67  size_t interval_;
68 
69  // private methods
70  void boundaryOcclusionFeature(cv::Mat& feature, const int flen, const int padsize);
71  template<typename IT> void features(const cv::Mat& im, cv::Mat& feature) const;
72 public:
73  HOGFeatures() {}
74  HOGFeatures(size_t binsize, size_t nscales, size_t flen, size_t norient) :
75  binsize_(binsize), nscales_(nscales), flen_(flen), norient_(norient) {
76  // TODO: don't hard code this. Compute more intuitively from scales rather than interval
77  interval_ = nscales_;
78  sfactor_ = pow(2.0f, 1.0f/(float)interval_);
79  assert(norient_%2 == 0);
80 
81  }
82  virtual ~HOGFeatures() {}
83  // get methods
84  size_t binsize(void) const { return binsize_; }
85  size_t nscales(void) const { return nscales_; }
86  vectorf scales(void) const { return scales_; }
87  void pyramid(const cv::Mat& im, vectorMat& pyrafeatures);
88 };
